upgrades.rationale: Position 1 agent active EVERY turn. +1 influence = +7 cubes over cycle. MAXIMUM territorial impact.
Zero influence is UNACCEPTABLE. Even 1 cube per turn adds pressure. Activating dead weight.
Military REMOVAL agent. More cubes for Barracks conquest. His ability DESTROYS enemy positions.
Reaches Level 2. Stronger military economy for late-game offensive.
Reaches Level 2. Palace access with Noble faction. Threatens high-VP throne squares.

new_influence_pool_projection.note: Cumulative influence available across all active agents per turn

reasoning: FINAL CYCLE. 25 VP behind P2 - need MAXIMUM territorial aggression. Invested 5 VP into cheap upgrades that maximize influence pool. Position 1 upgrade affects EVERY turn. Siege Master Kragg is my REMOVAL specialist - his ability destroys enemy positions. Baron gives Palace access for high-VP squares. Every cube I deploy is a cube DENYING opponents VP. This is WAR.

strategic_notes.removal_focus: Siege Master Kragg ability for surgical strikes on enemy concentrations
strategic_notes.winning_formula: Control more VP squares than opponents. Destroy their positions. Take what's theirs.
